response.overview: Meet the everyday people who risk their lives in order to become outlaw heroes and fulfill their adrenaline addictions through automobiles custom-built for speed. The underground phenomenon of illegal street racing has grown in popularity around the world, and this installment of the Fast & Wild series showcases real races in which souped-up cars battle one another through city streets at dangerously reckless speeds.
response.title: Fast & Wild: Dangerous Lifestyles
